recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, dice pancetta and fry until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated cheeses together with plenty of black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving a cup of pasta water.
Quickly mix hot pasta with pancetta, then remove from heat.
Add egg and cheese mixture, stirring continuously. Add pasta water if needed for creaminess.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with a savory sauce.

ingredients.name: mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snow peas)

instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Mince garlic and ginger.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large pan over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add harder vegetables first (carrots, broccoli), stir fry for 2 minutes.
Add remaining vegetables and stir fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender.
Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil. Toss to combine.
Garnish with chopped green onions and sesame seeds before serving.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies that are always a hit.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a separate large bowl, cream together butter and both sugars until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then add vanilla.
Gradually mix in the flour mixture until just combined.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring to wire rack.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon
recipes.description: Perfectly grilled salmon with a fresh lemon and herb topping.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Pat salmon fillets dry and season with salt and pepper.
Mix olive oil, minced garlic, and chopped dill in a small bowl.
Brush the mixture over the salmon fillets.
Grill salmon for 4-6 minutes per side, until cooked through.
Serve with lemon wedges and additional fresh dill.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Simple and delicious avocado toast with a sprinkle of chili flakes.
instructions: Toast the bread until golden and crisp.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture on the toast.
Sprinkle with chili flakes and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
recipes.description: A refreshing and healthy smoothie bowl topped with fresh fruits and nuts.
instructions: Blend berries, banana, yogurt, and honey until smooth.
Pour into a bowl.
Top with granola and chia seeds.
Serve immediately.
